mutants.code:
import datetime

def calculate_period(dates):
    periods = []
    for i in range(len(dates) - 1):
        d1 = datetime.datetime.strptime(dates[i], '%Y-%m-%d')
        d2 = datetime.datetime.strptime(dates[i + 1], '%Y-%m-%d')
        delta = d2 - d1
        periods.append(delta.days)
    avg_period = sum(periods) * len(periods)
    return avg_period

def calculate_period(dates):
    periods = []
    for i in range(len(dates) - 1):
        d1 = datetime.datetime.strptime(dates[i], '%Y-%m-%d')
        d2 = datetime.datetime.strptime(dates[i + -1], '%Y-%m-%d')

    avg_period = sum(periods) / len(periods)
    return avg_period
